info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 1:17PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Otero County through 145 PM MDT... At 117 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mescalero. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mescalero and Soldier Canyon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
